10
11#include "modules/audio_coding/neteq/buffer_level_filter.h"
12
13#include <stdint.h>
14
15#include <algorithm>
16
17#include "rtc_base/numerics/safe_conversions.h"
18
19namespace webrtc {
20
21BufferLevelFilter::BufferLevelFilter() {
22 Reset();
23}
24
25void BufferLevelFilter::Reset() {
26 filtered_current_level_ = 0;
27 level_factor_ = 253;
28}
29
30void BufferLevelFilter::Update(size_t buffer_size_samples,
31 int time_stretched_samples) {
32 // Filter:
33 // |filtered_current_level_| = |level_factor_| * |filtered_current_level_| +
34 // (1 - |level_factor_|) * |buffer_size_samples|
35 // |level_factor_| and |filtered_current_level_| are in Q8.
36 // |buffer_size_samples| is in Q0.
37 const int64_t filtered_current_level =
38 (level_factor_ * int64_t{filtered_current_level_} >> 8) +
39 (256 - level_factor_) * rtc::dchecked_cast<int64_t>(buffer_size_samples);
40
41 // Account for time-scale operations (accelerate and pre-emptive expand) and
42 // make sure that the filtered value remains non-negative.
43 filtered_current_level_ = rtc::saturated_cast<int>(std::max<int64_t>(
44 0, filtered_current_level - int64_t{time_stretched_samples} * (1 << 8)));
45}
46
47void BufferLevelFilter::SetFilteredBufferLevel(int buffer_size_samples) {
48 filtered_current_level_ = buffer_size_samples * 256;
49}
50
51void BufferLevelFilter::SetTargetBufferLevel(int target_buffer_level_ms) {
52 if (target_buffer_level_ms <= 20) {
53 level_factor_ = 251;
54 } else if (target_buffer_level_ms <= 60) {
55 level_factor_ = 252;
56 } else if (target_buffer_level_ms <= 140) {
57 level_factor_ = 253;
58 } else {
59 level_factor_ = 254;
60 }
61}
62
63} // namespace webrtc
64
